## WorkflowService.restartActivity() method

Restarts an automated Activity Instance which is in Failed state. This operation returns an instance of 'ActivityInstance' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static restartActivity({ escapedActivityInstanceId, }: {
        escapedActivityInstanceId: string;
    }): CancelablePromise<ActivityInstance>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter                      | Type                                   | Description |
| ------------------------------ | -------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| { escapedActivityInstanceId, } | { escapedActivityInstanceId: string; } |             |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;[ActivityInstance](./open-api-client.activityinstance.md)<!-- -->&gt;

ActivityInstance The request was successful.
